  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x254
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x254
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x230
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 306x18
          text run at (0,0) width 306: "Adding outline should not affect layer positions"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,220) size 10x10
